title: Lakshmi Kasu Haaram with Emerald and Diamond Embellishments
features: This stunning Kasu Haaram features intricately designed Lakshmi Kasu coins suspended from a cascading arrangement of emerald beads and polki diamonds. The central pendant showcases a mesmerizing emerald center stone surrounded by a halo of dazzling polki diamonds. Each coin displays a finely detailed engraving of Goddess Lakshmi, embodying prosperity and abundance. Features a modern design with traditional South Indian elements. Diamond and emerald accents add a touch of royalty.
occasions: Ideal for traditional occasions such as weddings (Vivaham/పెళ్లి)
and religious ceremonies. Perfect for Muhurtham
or any grand celebration where you want to make a statement. Also
description: This Kasu Haaram is a timeless investment, representing both cultural heritage and exquisite craftsmanship. The combination of emeralds and polki diamonds creates a unique and eye-catching design. The Lakshmi Kasu coins are believed to bring good fortune and prosperity. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting luster and shine. A truly heirloom-worthy piece.
